title: Planned Cement Job
description: A single cement job description for the purpose of planning.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Human recognizable context for the cement job.

JobTypeID.title: Job Type ID
JobTypeID.x-osdu-existing-standard: Proposed reference values: Primary, Plug, Squeeze, Unknown

WorkStringID.title: Work String ID
WorkStringID.description: Identifier of the TubularAssembly that describes the cement work string

WaterDepth.title: Water Depth
WaterDepth.description: Water depth if offshore. The distance from mean sea level to water bottom.

IsReturnsToSeabed.title: Is Returns To Seabed
IsReturnsToSeabed.description: Returns to seabed? Values are "true" (or "1") and "false" (or "0").

IsReciprocating.title: Is Reciprocating
IsReciprocating.description: Pipe being reciprocated.  Values are "true" (or "1") and "false" (or "0").

EstimatedWaitingOnCement.title: Estimated Waiting On Cement
EstimatedWaitingOnCement.description: Estimated duration for waiting on cement to set.

EstimatedPluggedTopMeasuredDepth.title: Estimated Plugged Top Measured Depth
EstimatedPluggedTopMeasuredDepth.description: If Plug, estimated measured depth of top of plug. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

EstimatedPluggedBaseMeasuredDepth.title: Estimated Plugged Base Measured Depth
EstimatedPluggedBaseMeasuredDepth.description: If Plug,  estimated measured depth of bottom of plug. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

EstimatedHoleMeasuredDepth.title: Estimated Hole Measured Depth
EstimatedHoleMeasuredDepth.description: Estimated measured depth at bottom of hole. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

EstimatedPreviousShoeMeasuredDepth.title: Estimated Previous Shoe Measured Depth
EstimatedPreviousShoeMeasuredDepth.description: Estimated measured depth of previous shoe. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

EstimatedPreviousShoeTrueVerticalDepth.title: Estimated Previous Shoe True Vertical Depth
EstimatedPreviousShoeTrueVerticalDepth.description: Estimated True Vertical Depth of previous shoe. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

EstimatedStringSetMeasuredDepth.title: Estimated String Set Measured Depth
EstimatedStringSetMeasuredDepth.description: Estimated measured depth of cement string shoe. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

EstimatedStringSetTrueVerticalDepth.title: Estimated String Set True Vertical Depth
EstimatedStringSetTrueVerticalDepth.description: Estimated True vertical depth of cement string shoe. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

CementStages.title: Cement Stages
CementStages.description: Set of stages for the job (usually 1 or 2).

IntervalTopMeasuredDepth.title: Interval Top Measured Depth
IntervalTopMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth at top of interval. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

CementBaseMeasuredDepth.title: Cement Base Measured Depth
CementBaseMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth of base of cement. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

CementingFluid.title: Cementing Fluid
CementingFluid.description: Displaced Mud, washes and spacers, cements, displacement mud.

TypeFluid.title: Type Fluid
TypeFluid.description: Fluid type: Mud, Wash, Spacer, Slurry.

FluidIndex.title: Fluid Index
FluidIndex.description:
Fluid Index: 1: first fluid pumped (=original mud), 
					(last-1)=Tail cement, last= displacement mud

FluidTopMeasuredDepth.title: Fluid Top Measured Depth
FluidTopMeasuredDepth.description: Estimated Measured depth at top of slurry placement.

FluidBaseMeasuredDepth.title: Fluid Base Measured Depth
FluidBaseMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth at bottom of slurry placement.

PumpRate.title: Pump Rate
PumpRate.description: Rate fluid is pumped. 0 means it is a pause.

BackPressure.title: Back Pressure
BackPressure.description: Back pressure applied during pumping stage.

Viscosity.title: Viscosity
Viscosity.description: Viscosity (Newtonian) or Plastic Viscosity if Bingham.

YieldPoint.title: Yield Point
YieldPoint.description: Yield point (Bingham and Herschel Bulkley models).

N.title: N
N.description: Power Law index (Power Law and HB).

BaseFluidType.title: Base Fluid Type
BaseFluidType.description: Type of base fluid: Fresh water, Sea water, Brine, Brackish water.

DryBlendMass.title: Dry Blend Mass
DryBlendMass.description: Mass of dry blend: the blend is made of different solid additives: the volume is not constant.

DryBlendMassSack.title: Dry Blend MassSack
DryBlendMassSack.description: Weight of a sack of dry blend.

CementAdditives.title: Cement Additives
CementAdditives.description: Additives can be added in slurry but also in spacers, washes, mud.

items.title: Cement Additive
items.description: Additives used during a cement job

AdditiveTypeID.title: Additive Type ID
AdditiveTypeID.description: Identifier of additive type or Function (Retarder, Viscosifier, Weighting agent).

TypeConc.title: Type Conc
TypeConc.description: ConcentrationType: %BWOC (%By weight of Cement), %BWOB (%By weight of blend), %BWOW (%By weight of water), %BWOBF (%By weight of base fluid)

Concentration.title: Concentration
Concentration.description: Concentration Amount: unit type depends of typeConc.

WtSack.title: Weight Sack
WtSack.description: Concentration in terms of weight per sack.

VolSack.title: Volume Sack
VolSack.description: Concentration in terms of volume per sack.

IsFoamUsed.title: Is Foam Used
IsFoamUsed.description: Foam used indicator.  Values are "true" (or "1") and "false" (or "0").

GasFoamType.title: Gas Foam Type
GasFoamType.description: Gas type used for foam job.

GasFoamVol.title: Gas Foam Vol
GasFoamVol.description: Volume of gas used for foam job.

StringMeasuredDepth.title: String Measured Depth
StringMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth of string (multi-stage cement job). Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

ToolMeasuredDepth.title: Tool Measured Depth
ToolMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth of tool (multi-stage cement job. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

CoilTubingMeasuredDepth.title: Coil Tubing Measured Depth
CoilTubingMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth of CoilTubing (multi-stage cement job. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

OutsideCasingVolume.title: Outside Casing Volume
OutsideCasingVolume.description: Estimated volume outside casing for this stage placement.

ViscoFunnelMud.title: Viscosity Funnel Mud
ViscoFunnelMud.description: Marsh funnel viscosity measured in a conical-shaped funnel, fitted with a small-bore tube on the bottom end through which mud flows under a gravity head. It is a time measurement, i.e., the time it takes for a given volume of fluid to flow through the funnel.

PlasticViscoMud.title: Plastic Viscosity Mud
PlasticViscoMud.description: Plastic viscosity (in hole at start of job).

YieldPointMud.title: Yield Point Mud
YieldPointMud.description: Yield point (in hole at start of job).

Gel10Sec.title: Gel10 Sec
Gel10Sec.description: Gels-10Sec (in hole at start of job).

Gel10Min.title: Gel10 Min
Gel10Min.description: Gels-10Min (in hole at start of job).

SqueezeMeasuredDepth.title: Squeeze Measured Depth
SqueezeMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth of squeeze. DDepth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

IsCoilTubing.title: Is Coil Tubing
IsCoilTubing.description: Coiled Tubing Used (true=CTU used). Values are "true" (or "1") and "false" (or "0").

TubularAssemblyID.title: Tubular Assembly Identifier
TubularAssemblyID.description: Identifier of the tubular assembly actually installed or to be installed

WellboreArchitectureID.title: Wellbore Architecture ID
WellboreArchitectureID.description: Identifier of the Wellbore Architecture describing the geometry of the installed tubular.

EstimatedCementTopMeasuredDepth.title: Estimated Cement Top Measured Depth
EstimatedCementTopMeasuredDepth.description: The estimated Measured depth of the Top of Cement. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

CementToolTubularComponentID.title: Cement Tool Tubular Component ID
CementToolTubularComponentID.description: The identifier of the TubularComponent used for Cementing the wellbore
